settings.title: Shipping & Returns
settings.answer:
We currently offer FREE express shipping for all orders above £25 / $30 to the UK and USA. For other countries we charge a flat £10 charge.

All orders will ship in February 2022, we will send you a confirmation for your payment now and another email with tracking details when your order ships.

After receiving your order, you will have a 100 day “smile guarantee” where you can return your electric toothbrush with no questions asked if desired. For more information on returns please see our Returns Policy

settings.title: SURI Promise / Guarantee
settings.answer:
We hope that you love your SURI completely, if for whatever reason you don't we will offer a 100 day smile (money-back) guarantee no questions asked.

We are currently producing our brush and will be sending updates along the way including a tracking number when it ships in February. If you change your mind at any point before we ship your order you may cancel your order and ask for a refund (we hope you don’t of course!).

settings.title: Updating your order
settings.answer: You can amend or change your order including ask for a refund up until your order ships. After your order ships our 100 day money back guarantee will start and you will be able to return your purchase to us with no questions asked for up to 100 days. To make any amends contact support@trysuri.com .

settings.title: Recycling
settings.answer:
We offer free recycling for our toothbrush heads when you subscribe. Every order will come with a compostable return mailer for you to send the heads back to us -we ask that you collect at least 3 before sending them to reduce our carbon footprint.

If you would like to recycle your head or brush and are not subscribed please contact us at support@trysuri.com and we'll send you a mailer -we currently offer pre-paid shipping for recycling in the UK only (but are looking to expand globally soon).

settings.title: Product Problems
settings.answer:
We hope your SURI is always working perfectly, however if anything appears wrong or not functioning please contact us as soon as possible at support@trysuri.com for help.

Note if your SURI won't charge or turn on we recommend using another USB charger and wall outlet as a first step.
